attributes.title: So bad

One of my dogs had a really bad panic attack and we had to take him to the hospital so he wouldnâ€™t have a heart attack. He's really old. I also noticed that when I open the app my phone gets really hot really fast. Iâ€™ve also got notifications that the app has been working in the background while Iâ€™m not on it even though I donâ€™t have it set to do so.
